name: Rocky (itch)
description:
A fun short game inspired by 'Grow Home' and 'Getting Over It'.

Made for the 'Mix and Game Jam'.

This incorporates with the theme as I took the game mechanic from the game 'Grow Home' where the player can climb a brilliantly designed 3D world. This game takes that mechanic and changes the dimensions into 2D as required.

As for the objective it is similar to the game 'Getting Over It', in the sense that you the player must get to the top.

It's a fun little game that can be played to pass a few minutes!

A controller is needed for the best experience(preferably connected via USB). But a keyboard is also usable.

Enjoy the game, and as usual any feedback is greatly appreciated!
